name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GBF Raiders 2: The Chrome Extenstion Identity

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: From The Creator Of GBFRaiders, A Chrome Extension That Shows A List Of Current Raids For GBF Right In Your Browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find raids for Granblue Fantasy without going to GBF Raiders or Tweetdeck! Select which raids to follow in the options and then click on the extension icon to see the last 20 raids! Click on the join button to copy the raid's id to your clipboard!
